episodes.title: Faith Betrayed: The Dark Secrets Behind Jesus Image Church
episodes.description:
A Whistleblower has come forward with information about @jesusimage and @MKoulianos and the spiritual abuse happening at Jesus Image Church in Orlando, FL. Today we uncover the evidence of these manipulations. 

This is only the first step, sourced from publicly available resources to show the world that Jesus image church is not what it seems. There will be more to come as we gather the stories of those who have become victims of Michael and Jessica Koulianos. 

Subscribe to this channel for more installments of this series.
